author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Lahaina's heart there doth rages a fire,
By cruel blaze, many souls their lives did tire,
With monk's tears and aloof, I do quoth,
To extinguish, call upon Saint Arnold, the patron of ale and broth.

Oh, San Francisco, once jewel of the coast,
Why doth thee suffer, and wilt like a ghost?
Raise thy chalice and pray for divine help,
Lest thou tumble further into disorder's kelp.

In the sacred bond of wedlock we find,
Chores blend, like wine and water, in kind,
A CFO, a COO, these roles we charter,
To keep the peace and avoid marital barter.

feedItems.title: Maui Blaze Kills at Least 89, Highest Wildfire Death Toll in Over 100 Years
feedItems.description: The center of Lahaina remained barricaded and firefighters worked to extinguish flare-ups among the smoldering embers of the wildfire.

feedItems.title: Can San Francisco Save Itself From the Doom Loop?
feedItems.description: The city is racing to come up with solutions for its downtown, hollowed out by a tech exodus and struggling with homelessness and street crime

feedItems.title: Your Marriage Needs a CFO and a COO
feedItems.description: Couples take a page out of the corporate playbook when it comes to the loaded chore of dividing household labor.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In the heart where commerce’s coinage flows,
Wall Street’s measure of gloom comes into the light,
Strength glows, yet the inverted yield towards woe grows,
New scrutiny brews in the economic night.

Upon states united, a Vice of Taiwan stance,
Rattles the dragon, betwixt in a binding affair,
React fiercely, Beijing, risk a deadly dance,
Or birth tension twixt capitals snared in bitter snare.

Fair San Francisco, trapped in a doom loop’s hold,
Tech takes flight, leaving hollow heart in wake,
Desperate race, solutions untold,
For the homeless plight and crime oath they undertake.

feedItems.title: What Wall Street's Top Recession Gauge Is Saying Now
feedItems.description: Signs of economic strength are bringing new scrutiny to the inverted yield curve.

feedItems.title: U.S. Visit by Taiwan Vice President Puts China in a Bind
feedItems.description: An aggressive response by Beijing could reignite tensions with Washington and backfire in Taiwan’s presidential election next year.

feedItems.title: Can San Francisco Save Itself From the Doom Loop?
feedItems.description: The city is racing to come up with solutions for its downtown, hollowed out by a tech exodus and struggling with homelessness and street crime.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In the land where silver is sought and bought,
A goat craves not gold, but green in sight.
Five million moons for nest, thus brought,
Yet field and forest yield greater delight.

A snail upon the Silk Road embarks,
Dupont and Dragon negotiate with might.
Yet in the shell of treaties, danger lurks,
Crafted compromises can’t cage the flight.

The hare elected mayor in quaint village square,
Then banished from hall, in unfair fight.
In this burrow of scandal, beware,
Even a shepherd's rule can incite slight.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: What a $5 million retirement in America looks like right now

feedItems.title: DuPont China Deal Reveals Cracks in U.S. National-Security Screening
feedItems.description: U.S. officials crafted a compromise to address worries about China’s military. It didn’t go as planned.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: He was elected mayor—and then says he was locked out of town hall. The scandal rocking a small American town.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
At the Fair of Iowa, midst of summer's light,
Trump, the chieftain, wears his crown with might.
Despite his legal quagmire, steadfast held,
Drawing zealous throng, their cheers are welled.

In this summer, the fair maidens reign,
Commanding economy, hold they the main.
Their triumph in sun's reign shall inspire,
To all they rise, none higher aspire.

Consult the Allfather's eye in the dark sky,
For the shower of meteors, soon to ply.
Saturday eve to Sunday morn holds the peak,
In silence watch, let the heavens speak.

feedItems.title: Trump Overshadows DeSantis and GOP Field at Iowa State Fair
feedItems.description: The former president drew large, enthusiastic crowds despite his mounting legal peril.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: Women own this summer. The economy proves it.

feedItems.title: Perseid Meteor Shower 2023: When It Is and How to Watch the Peak
feedItems.description: What NASA calls among the best meteor showers of the year peaks Saturday night into Sunday morning.
